msbt.message: Say, kiddo! How'd you like to get yourself a sparkler? 'Cause I just happen to have one here for ya!
Now we can have us a big show up above and a little one down below. This'll be a hoot, !
Well, shoot! Looks like your pockets are all out of room, .Tell you what How about you go lighten your load, and I'll just hang onto this for ya till you get back?
